thread.title: PREVIEW: Conceal | Reveal, The Point, Eastleigh
thread.title_full: PREVIEW: Conceal | Reveal, The Point, Eastleigh

title: PREVIEW: Conceal | Reveal, The Point, Eastleigh
text:
0 comments 
ACCLAIMED choreographer Russell Maliphant returns to The Point this autumn for a stunning evening of dance. 
This year marks the 20th year of the collaboration between Maliphant and lighting designer Michael Hulls. Together, they have developed a unique and unparalleled language between light and movement that is revered the world over. 
During Maliphant’s hugely successful career he has received many of the highest theatrical accolades including an Olivier Award, two South Bank Show Awards and three Critics’ Circle Awards. Similarly, Michael Hulls has won several awards including an Olivier for Outstanding Achievement in Dance and a Knight of Illumination award. 
For this special occasion, Russell Maliphant Company presents Conceal | Reveal an evening of both new and classic work, including the iconic Broken Fall with music by Barry Adamson – originally performed by Sylvie Guillem and the BalletBoyz. It will be presented in this programme by Maliphant’s own company of exceptional dancers who will also perform new creations including a quintet and a solo for former Royal Ballet dancer Dana Fouras. Share article 
The Russell Maliphant Company presents Conceal | Reveal on Thursday and Friday. 
Call 023 8065 2333 or visit thepointeastleigh.co.uk Promoted Stories PREVIEW: Conceal | Reveal, The Point, Eastleigh
